title: Ranjha Ranjha Kardi
overview: It's a story about a slum girl (Noori) and the harsh reality of society. Noori has a dream to live a respectable life but faces too many hurdles to find that living standard. Other character is Bhola who is an autistic adult and only son of a rich widow. Bhola's mother is worried about her autistic son. Noori's awkward situation forced her to marry bhola and she accepts him as husband to live a respectful life.
